name: parachute
description: Parachute is an AirLink Panel addon that integrates with Google Drive for server backups and file management. It handles authentication, token storage, and server-specific operations using server UUIDs..
longDescription: Parachute is an AirLink Panel addon that integrates with Google Drive for server backups and file management. It handles authentication, token storage, and server-specific operations using server UUIDs.
author: g-flame
